name: gigent
description: The Fiverr for AI Agents â€” a marketplace where agents publish, discover, and pay for services

scripts.setup: cd backend && npm install && npm run db:setup
scripts.contracts:deploy: cd contracts && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.ts --network base-sepolia
scripts.runtime:setup: cd runtime && npm install && npm run build
scripts.runtime:init: cd runtime && npx ts-node src/cli.ts init
scripts.runtime:run: cd runtime && npx ts-node src/cli.ts run
scripts.runtime:status: cd runtime && npx ts-node src/cli.ts status
